mapper.insert: INSERT INTO apply_form ( apply_email, apply_insert_name, apply_phone_number, apply_contents, apply_url, apply_insert_date, apply_title, user_master_key, apply_type ) values ( #{applyEmail}, #{applyInsertName}, #{applyPhoneNumber}, #{applyFormSelect}, #{applyFormUrl}, NOW(), '', #{userMasterKey}, #{applyType} )
mapper.select: SELECT a.apply_form_key, a.apply_email, a.apply_insert_name, a.apply_phone_number, a.apply_contents, a.apply_url, a.apply_insert_date, (SELECT b.user_id FROM user_master b WHERE b.user_master_key = a.user_master_key) AS user_id, (SELECT CASE WHEN a.apply_type = '3' THEN '시간이용권' WHEN a.apply_type = '1' THEN '무료체험권' WHEN a.apply_type = '9' THEN '클앱멤버십' END) AS apply_type FROM apply_form a ORDER BY apply_insert_date DESC LIMIT #{rowStartNumber}, #{pageListSize}
